item.title: CVE-2021-35093|2024-08-04T00:33:51.165Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- bluecore
item.description: Possible memory corruption in BT controller when it receives an oversized LMP packet over 2-DH1 link and leads to denial of service in BlueCore
